description: An agile and light hiking shoe that offers you the impossible: impeccable grip, featherweight and foolproof protection. The CROSS HIKE 2 MID GORE-TEX WIDE features deep, aggressive multi-directional lugs, a mid-rise design that wraps around the ankle, and generous toe volume. This model will accompany you in your craziest adventures, whatever the type of terrain and weather conditions.
name: Salomon Cross Hike 2 Mid GTX, Wide - Mens
